text: The Men's 4 × 100 metre freestyle relay competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 13 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Team !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|||align=left|3:08.24||Beijing||11 August 2008 |- |African record||align=left|||align=left|3:11.93||Rome||26 July 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|||align=left|3:22.76||Bloemfontein||19 October 2016 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Nation !! Time !!
